name: A Glider's Story - Beta
description:
A GLIDER'S STORY [BETA]

Welcome to the beta of our small yet ambitious project: A Glider's Story. 

Note: The game is in early development so expect some bugs here and there. We would love to hear your feedback on our discord server:

https://discord.gg/BJp3qdyQ5c

CONTROLS

[E] Use[ESC] Menu[F] Deploy Glider
[G] Pickup Glider
[C] Use Speed Boost
[X] Land Glider
[W/S] Control Pitch in Glider
[A/D] Control Rotation in Glider

Getting used to the glider takes a while. I suggest you go to a high place and start from there. Make sure to jump before pressing [F] and don't pitch up too much because you will lose speed that way!
